'''''À la volonté du peuple''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to find and dig up all the chests from the treasure maps that can be found in [[Huge Shell]]s around [[Morte Region|Morte Region, Fontaine]].
